name: Apollonia 6
description: '''Apollonia 6''' was an American female singing trio founded in 1983 by [[Prince (musician)|Prince]], as a successor to his previous group [[Vanity 6]] following the departure of lead singer [[Vanity (singer)|Vanity]]. Singers [[Brenda Bennett]] and [[Susan Moonsie]] continued from the earlier group, while actress and model [[Apollonia Kotero]] joined as frontwoman. The group released one album and dissolved in 1985.
